name: A Mystery In London: 1889
description:
It's been only a few short months since Jack The Ripper's reign of terror - the people of London seek a return to more peaceful times, but before their wishes are answered, a new evil strikes!

The Midnight Napper has been kidnapping young girls across London, and it's up to Detective Benedict Snow to find these girls and arrest the culprit before it's too late. Travel to various locations in Victorian London, speak to eyewitnesses, and search for clues in order to determine who the Midnight Napper really is!
